abstract: Ukrainian Pres Petro O Poroshenko appoints former Georgian Pres Mikheil Saakashvili as governor of Odessa region; Saakashvili, longtime foe of Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin, will be tasked with protecting region coveted by Russian separatists.
lead_paragraph: President Petro O. Poroshenko of Ukraine appointed Mikheil Saakashvili as governor of Odessa, turning to a longtime nemesis of President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia for help governing an area coveted by pro-Russian separatists.

headline.main: Ex-President of Georgia to Lead Ukraine Region
headline.print_headline: Ex-President of Georgia to Lead Ukraine Region

snippet: President Petro O. Poroshenko of Ukraine appointed Mikheil Saakashvili as governor of Odessa, turning to a longtime nemesis of President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia for help governing an area coveted by pro-Russian separatists.
